lead_paragraph: The latest action, for 2.23 million vehicles, reveals just how much Honda, the automaker most affected by the defective airbags, continues to be haunted by them.

headline.print_headline: Honda Expands Recall of Takata Airbags as Crisis Widens
headline.main: Honda Expands Recall of Takata Airbags as Its Longtime Partner’s Crisis Widens

snippet: The latest action, for 2.23 million vehicles, reveals just how much Honda, the automaker most affected by the defective airbags, continues to be haunted by them.
abstract: Honda Motor expands its recall of vehicles using Takata Corp airbags by 2.23 million; recall comes after National Highway Traffic Safety Administration announcement that five million more vehicles would have to be recalled because of Takata's defective airbags.
